data.title: How much do WPKN Inc employees make?
data.meta_description: The average annual salary of WPKN Inc is estimated to be approximate $110,881 per year. The majority pay is between $97,665 to $125,134 per year. Visit Salary.com to find out WPKN Inc salary, WPKN Inc pay rate, and more.
data.text:
View salary at WPKN Inc by Job Title BETA

The average salary of WPKN Inc jobs will vary depending on the location, industry, category, and department. The table below shows the job titles you might be interested in and the salary range of different positions at WPKN Inc. A difference in pay for the same job title may be based on a number of factors, such as experience, training, level of education, skills and competencies, and so on. Director, Benefits jobs at WPKN Inc earn the most with an average annual salary of $196,894, while Host jobs earn the least with an average annual salary of $24,910.

The estimate average salary for WPKN Inc employees is around $110,881 per year, or the hourly rate of WPKN Inc rate is $53. The highest earners in the top 75th percentile are paid over $125,134. Individual salaries will vary depending on the job, department, and location, as well as the employee’s level of education, certifications, and additional skills.

JOB TITLE SALARY RANGE AVERAGE SALARY COMPANY NAME Director, Benefits $175,823 - $215,954 $196,894 WPKN Inc News Director $141,278 - $177,010 $155,797 WPKN Inc General Manager $128,883 - $169,458 $150,272 WPKN Inc Project Manager $106,079 - $128,353 $117,557 WPKN Inc Programmer $68,755 - $82,741 $75,700 WPKN Inc Host $22,989 - $27,881 $24,910 WPKN Inc

DISCLAIMER: The salary range presented here is an estimation that has been derived from our proprietary algorithm. It should be noted that this range does not originate from the company's factual payroll records or survey data.

1. How much does WPKN Inc in the United States pay?

WPKN Inc pays its employees an average of $110,881 per year. The average salary at WPKN Inc range from $97,665 to $125,134 per year. Director, Benefits jobs at WPKN Inc earn the most with an average annual salary of $196,894, while Host jobs earn the least with an average annual salary of $24,910.

2. Do WPKN Inc employees get a higher salary than other similar companies?

The salary at WPKN Inc is lesser than Radio Bolero Inc. The highest salary package reported for an employee at WPKN Inc is $125,134 per year, meanwhile the highest salary package reported for an employee at Radio Bolero Inc is $131,853 per year.

3. How much does WPKN Inc pay compared to Radio Bolero Inc?

The average annual salary at WPKN Inc is $110,881, or an hourly wage of $53, in comparison to Radio Bolero Inc which pays $116,830 per year or $56 per hour.

4. Which job skills can boost a Project Manager salary at WPKN Inc?

Project Management, Planning and Leadership are key to a Project Manager job at WPKN Inc. Possessing these skills could lead to a higher salary. You can learn and develop high income skills now if you’re looking for a position at WPKN Inc.

5. What is the lowest salary at WPKN Inc?

The lowest paying job at WPKN Inc is Host with an annual salary of $24,910 or an hourly rate of $53.
